english_example_sentence: People who are happy in life spread joy to their surroundings.
russian_example_sentence: Люди, которые счастливы в жизни, распространяют радость вокруг себя.
turkish_example_sentence: Hayatta mutlu olan insanlar, çevrelerine neşe saçar.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Hayatta mutlu ______ insanlar, çevrelerine neşe saçar.
